title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the original image is still displayed.
EB: When importing 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the expected behavior is that the new image should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the layout where 'image1.jpg' is displayed.
3. Import 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.
